name: I Saw Him Today
description:
Sometimes you have to come face to face with ghosts from your past.

Warning: game contains no graphic images but contains mentions of suicide.

A short, emotional visual novel made in under 48 hours for Ludum Dare 42 by Mikomi Kisomi. Please do not ask for choices to be added, as they are not in this game for a reason.

Thank you for downloading.
